## üöÄ–ò—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ

::: code-tabs#language

@tab TS

```ts
// .vuepress/config.ts
import { defineUserConfig } from "vuepress";
import { hopeTheme } from "vuepress-theme-hope";

  theme: hopeTheme({
    // your theme config here
  }),
});
```

@tab JS

```js

  theme: hopeTheme({
    // your theme config here
  }),
};
```
